text: we as a country need to be bold to step
forward to believe in ourselves that's
why I've invited you here today to tell
you why I have decided to stand for the
leadership to explain the course that we
must take in the weight of the
referendum and to set up my vision for
Britain I'm running in this leadership
contest for one reason and one reason
alone I want this country I love and
which has given me so much to embrace
this opportunity for change with
optimism and with conviction I have to
say I never thought I'd be in this
position I did not want it indeed that
it almost everything I could not to be a
candidate for the leadership of this
party I was so very reluctant because I
know my limitations whatever charisma is
I don't have it
whatever glamour may be I don't think
anyone could have resisted me with it
but at every step in my political life
I've lost myself one question what is
the right thing to do what does your
heart tell you
however inconvenient however difficult
whatever personal risk it may entail
what is the right thing to do what does
your heart tell you
